name: healthcare-plans-ai-platform
description: Healthcare Plans AI Platform - ReGAIN Implementation

scripts.build:services: npm run build:plans && npm run build:customer && npm run build:order
scripts.build:frontends: npm run build:admin && npm run build:portal
scripts.start:all:bg: npm run start:plans:bg && npm run start:customer:bg && npm run start:order:bg
scripts.stop:all: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:8083 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:8084 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; cd devops/local/wiremock && docker-compose down 2>/dev/null; echo 'All services stopped'
scripts.stop:backend: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:8083 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:8084 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Backend services stopped'
scripts.stop:frontend: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Frontend apps stopped'
scripts.health: npm run health:backend; npm run health:frontend; npm run health:wiremock
scripts.health:backend: npm run health:plans; npm run health:customer; npm run health:order
scripts.health:frontend: npm run health:admin; npm run health:portal
scripts.health:admin: curl -s http://localhost:3000 > /dev/null && echo 'Admin:    UP' || echo 'Admin:    DOWN'
scripts.health:portal: curl -s http://localhost:3001 > /dev/null && echo 'Portal:   UP' || echo 'Portal:   DOWN'
scripts.db:plans: docker exec -it healthcare-postgres psql -U plans_user -d plans_db
scripts.db:customer: docker exec -it healthcare-postgres psql -U customer_user -d customer_db
scripts.db:order: docker exec -it healthcare-postgres psql -U order_user -d order_db
scripts.db:truncate:plans: docker exec healthcare-postgres psql -U plans_user -d plans_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE plan_specialists, plan_providers, specialists, providers, plans CASCADE;'
scripts.db:truncate:customer: docker exec healthcare-postgres psql -U customer_user -d customer_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE customer_plan_enrollments, eligibility_checks, customer_documents, customer_dependents, customer_addresses, customers CASCADE;'
scripts.db:truncate:order: docker exec healthcare-postgres psql -U order_user -d order_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE invoice_line_items, invoices, payments, order_items, orders, saved_payment_methods CASCADE;'

author: Healthcare Platform Team
